channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Allegiant Air to acquire Sun Country Airlines for $1.5 billion
item.description: The airlines said travelers shouldn’t expect any immediate changes and can continue booking and flying with either carrier as they normally do.

item.title: Amazon On The Future For $50 AI Wearable That Listens To Conversations
item.description: You won't find it on Amazon's store just yet, but it sounds like the tech giant has big plans for subsidiary Bee's $50 listening AI band.

item.title: 2026 Mixture Of Experts (MoE) Models And The Consell De Cent
item.description: Consell de Cent analogy frames MoE: many experts, one router per token, boosting scale efficiently.

item.title: ‘Apple Intelligence,’ powered by Gemini, marks a ‘major validation moment for Google,’ top tech analyst says
item.description: The deal allowing Apple to tap into Google's AI technology was disclosed Monday in a joint statement from the Silicon Valley powerhouses.

item.title: Paramount fires back at Warner Bros. bid, launching proxy fight for board seats at annual meeting
item.description: Paramount has also filed a lawsuit asking Warner Bros. Discovery to give more information about its merger agreement with Netflix.

item.title: Grok blocked in Malaysia and Indonesia as sexual deepfake scandal builds
item.description: Scrutiny of Grok is growing, including in the EU, India, France and the UK, which said Monday it was moving to criminalize “nudification apps.”

item.title: Monkeys are on the loose in St. Louis, and AI-generated jokes are just slowing down animal control’s primate chase
item.description: “It's been a lot in regard to AI and what's genuine and what's not,” city health spokesperson Willie Springer. “People are just having fun.”

item.title: Apple’s Exclusive Google Deal Is Bad News For Samsung
item.description: Apple's AI deal with Google brings Gemini to iPhone — and gives Samsung a serious problem.

item.title: Recall of cheese products upgraded to highest danger level over Listeria-causing bacteria: FDA
item.description: The FDA announced that a recall of cheese products has been upgraded to the most serious risk category after testing positive for Listeria monocytogen...

item.title: Trump to interview BlackRock's Rick Rieder for Fed chair role
item.description: President Donald Trump will interview BlackRock's Rick Rieder on Thursday for the role of Federal Reserve chairman, sources tell FOX Business.

item.title: Apple’s Surprise iPhone Software Upgrade Here Any Minute Now, Report Claims
item.description: While waiting for iOS 26.3, reportedly due at the end of January, it looks like Apple is dropping in an extra iPhone update, and it could be here any ...

item.title: Former Fed chairs, Treasury secretaries defend Jerome Powell amid Trump DOJ's criminal probe
item.description: A group of former Federal Reserve chairs and ex-Treasury secretaries from both administrations of both parties is defending Fed Chair Jerome Powell am...

item.title: December inflation data will be 'extremely muddy' economists warn
item.description: Economists expect the December CPI inflation report to show price growth remained elevated and cautioned it may have a downward bias due to missing da...

item.title: LEGO Pokémon Range Revealed: Pikachu, Eevee, And A 6,800-Piece Beast
item.description: LEGO and The Pokémon Company International have finally announced the first three sets of their all-new collaboration, and they look fantastic.

item.title: Could Apple’s Gemini deal be the catalyst the stock needs?
These 6 reasons for gold’s surge are keeping investors bullish
Why stocks are rising despite Trump’s new pressure campaign against Powell
All 3 major indexes are moving into positive territory — live updates
Bank stocks could get a spark from these critical numbers this week
Consumer sentiment rises above expectations in January but remains below last year's level
item.description: Consumer sentiment rose to 54 in the University of Michigan's latest survey, exceeding economists' expectations despite concerns about elevated inflat...

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
